net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation

Class AbstractValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation.AbstractValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompositeValidator, PassAllValidator, RequiredLocalizationValidator, RequiredValueValidator, StringValueValidator

    public abstract class AbstractValidator
extends Object
implements Validator
    Abstract implementation of validator. Provides getter and setter methods for localized text keys used to get the error message text from a LocaleContext. A default short message is provided if neither the short message key or the short message are provided.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

        protected LocalizedText getDefaultShortMessage(LocaleContext localeContext)

        Returns:

      • getLongMessage

        public LocalizedText getLongMessage()
        Get the long error message. Use this property if the message has not yet been internationalized, other use getLongMessageKey(). If the localized text key has been set, the value of this property is ignored.
        Returns:
        The localized text.

      • getLongMessage

        public LocalizedText getLongMessage(LocaleContext localeContext)
        Description copied from interface: Validator
        Get the long error message to be displayed when the validation fails. This method may be called before Validator.isComponentDataValid(Component) is called.
        Specified by:
        getLongMessage in interface Validator
        Parameters:
        localeContext - The locale context.
        Returns:
        LocalizedText, may be null.

      • getLongMessageKey

        public LocalizedObjectKey getLongMessageKey()
        Get the long error message key. If set then the longMessage property is ignored.
        Returns:
        The localized text key.
